name: Gloop
description:
A prototype platformer in which you are a slime ball roaming around the screen. Find and collect the key in the stage and use it on the door to progress to the next level. Use the arrow keys to move around. Up is to jump and Down is to fast fall.

Challenges

Making Key work with door. This was difficult but I made the key a hidden point that would unlock the door once collected

Particles- Just couldn't figure this one out so the points are just green dots.

Character size- Had to adjust character size to make the game playable as well as reduce the amount of rain falling down on player.
